attributes.action: Give Some Major Regeneration Funding To Blackpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I live in Blackpool and it is a town desperately in need of regeneration. We are continuing to decline while other large towns and cities particularly our neighbours like Manchester and Liverpool are prospering from massive regeneration projects. Persistently our town has been ignored and offered no opportunities for regeneration.
